Saxmundham Mobile Library Route 14

Contact us:

Manager: Rob Alcraft and Peter Fiske

Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk

Telephone: 01473 351249

Route timetable

Stop Village Location Time
14A Frostenden Frostenden Corner 1000 – 1015
14B Frostenden Clay Common 1025 – 1040
14C Stoven Stoven Row 1050 – 1105
14D Brampton Woodside 1115 – 1130
14E Redisham Phone box 1145 – 1205
14F Ringsfield School Road 1215 – 1235
14G Ilketshall St Andrew Post Office Cottages 1345 – 1400
14H Ilketshall St Andrew Took’s Common 1405 – 1430
14I Ilketshall St Margaret Church 1445 – 1510
14J St Margaret S. Elmham Green 1515 – 1530
14K St Michael S. Elmham Green Farm 1540 – 1550

Calling every 4 weeks on Wednesdays:

2019: 30 January, 27 February, 27 March, 24 April, 22 May, 19 June, 17 July, 14 August, 11 September, 9 October, 6 November, 4 December
